resources.string: Perfect marriage biodata maker application creates best marriage biodata for the users so that they can share that marriage biodata with their relatives for wedding purposes. This application provides various themes and editing options to the users so that they can create marriage biodata as per their requirements. Marriage biodata is the first impression of brides or grooms before proceeding to marriage discussion or in between visits. This app provides general and suitable formats for all kind of marriage biodata in three different languages. Users can create marriage biodata in English, Marathi and Hindi languages.
